body_html: A small update on this matter. When we make the filters multiple of 16 and the dataset size multiple of 32, the training speed improves by a factor 30. Apparently when these two conditions are met, the data are repacked by MKL, which is much faster. Otherwise some slower functions are used, and the difference is massive.

body: A small update on this matter. When we make the filters multiple of 16 and the dataset size multiple of 32, the training speed improves by a factor 30. Apparently when these two conditions are met, the data are repacked by MKL, which is much faster. Otherwise some slower functions are used, and the difference is massive.
